suggest.meta_keywords: Azion Console, Activity History, user accountability, account insights, data stream integration, activity filtering, user actions, account security, Azion support, real-time logging
suggest.meta_description: Explore Azion Console to access and manage Activity History for insights into user actions, enhance security, and integrate with Data Stream.

current.meta_description: On Azion Console, you can access the history of all activities performed on the account and by all the users connected to the main account.
